resources.string: Photo detection can identify the category of the object and mark its position in the image.
Camera detection can identify the category of the object and mark its position in the camera.
Posenet can identify the facial features and body postures of human in different positions in the camera.
Style transfer can change the art style of usersâ€™ target images based on the standard image in the APP.
Image segmentation is used to detect the position of the target or the category of the object in the picture.
Image classification can infer the category of the object in the picture and indicate the probability of different categories.
Garbage classification identifies the garbage category of the object detected by the camera lens.
Scene detection can estimate the category of the target scene.
